title: Cathie Wood Sells Another $41.5M In Tesla As Shares Rally, Buys This Stock Instead
text: C athie Wood-led Ark Invest on Thursday further lowered its exposure in Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA), booking profit as shares of the electric vehicle maker rose after upbeat third-quarter earnings. The investment management firm sold 46,414 shares — estimated to be worth $41.49 million — in Tesla.

title: TSLA Stock: Why The Price Noticeably Increased Today
text: The stock price of Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) increased by 3.26% today, going from a previous close of $865.80 to $894. This is why it happened.

title: Elon Musk Becomes $373M Richer After Tesla's Stock Rise, Far And Away The World's Wealthiest Person
text: The gap between Elon Musk and the other ultra-wealthy continues to widen with increased valuations for Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) and SpaceX. What Happened: Tesla shares hit a high of $900.00 Thursday, nearly hitting their all-time high of $900.40, after releasing third-quarter earnings.

title: 4 Top Stock Trades for Friday: Tesla and Nvidia to All-Time Highs?
text: Tesla, Nvidia, Square and PayPal were our top stock trades for Friday. Let's look at the charts as Tesla and Nvidia push for new highs.

title: Tesla 'Margin Story' Taking Hold, Stock Priced to Perfection, Analysts Say After Q3 Print
text: Tesla, Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) shares advanced strongly Thursday in reaction to the electric vehicle maker's third-quarter earnings beat.  Here is a compilation of sell-side's take on the quarterly results:

title: Tesla share price forecast after Q3 results
text: Tesla,Inc. (NASDAQ: TSLA) shares have advanced from $778 to $900 since the beginning of October 2021, and the current price stands at $894. Tesla reported better than expected third-quarter results this Wednesday despite supply chain slowdowns and congestion at key ports.

title: Tesla Starts Rollout of Auto Insurance Based on Driving Practices
text: Tesla owners will be able to opt-in to a new program in which the automaker remotely monitors their driving practices and shares the data to determine the driver's auto insurance premium. title: Why Tesla Stock Jumped on Thursday
text: The electric car maker's soaring earnings in a difficult operating environment has investors cheering.

title: Electric cars are more popular than ever, but Tesla is losing market share to new competitors
text: Tesla's sales are accelerating rapidly, but its massive share of the total electric-car market is dropping as other brands enter the space.

title: Tesla's Driving Safety Data Decrypted By Dutch Forensic Lab
text: The Netherlands Forensic Institute uncovered Tesla vehicle data that provided insight into the safety of the company's autonomous driving technologies.

title: Why Tesla Shares Are Rising Today
text: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) is trading higher Thursday after the company announced better-than-expected third-quarter financial results.  Tesla reported quarterly earnings of $1.86 per share, which beat the estimate of $1.57 per share.

title: Tesla's 'full self-driving' rolls back its privacy protection of trip videos
text: Tesla owners can buy the company's "full self-driving" software for $10,000, but they may have to pay with their privacy.

title: U.S. safety board says driver, passenger seats occupied during fatal Tesla crash
text: The National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB) said on Thursday that both the driver and passenger seats were occupied during an April 17 fatal crash of a Tesla Model S in Spring, Texas.

title: Tesla looks to pave the way for Chinese battery makers to come to U.S.
text: Tesla Inc wants to shift to a less expensive battery for its electric vehicles but first needs to figure out how to overcome political tensions to get a Chinese partner to build the iron-based batteries near its U.S. factories.

title: Don't bet against Tesla, says former president. But here's why he's not a shareholder
text: Jon McNeill told CNBC on Thursday the EV industry is going to see multi-decade growth.

title: Tesla took a $51 million hit on its bitcoin investment in Q3 despite the token soaring 30%. Here's why.
text: According to Tesla's accountants, the company's bitcoin fell in value during the third quarter, despite the price jumping.

title: Stock futures slip as Tesla, IBM earnings weigh
text: U.S. stock futures were modestly lower Thursday as investors sifted through a deluge of earnings reports.

title: Dutch forensic lab says it has decoded Tesla's driving data
text: The Dutch government's forensic lab said on Thursday it had decrypted electric carmaker Tesla Inc's closely guarded driving data-storage system, uncovering a wealth of information that could be used to investigate serious accidents.

title: Tesla (TSLA) Q3 Earnings & Sales Top Estimates, Sales Jump 56.8% Y/Y
text: Tesla's (TSLA) Q3 earnings and sales surge 145% and 56.8% year on year, respectively.

title: Futures lower after Tesla, IBM quarterly results
text: U.S. stock index futures edged lower on Thursday as IBM and Tesla fell after their quarterly results, with investors awaiting more reports to see the impact of supply chain disruption and labor shortages on companies.

title: The Ratings Game: ‘Electric profits.' Analysts cheer what's under the hood of Tesla results despite supply headaches
text: Not even supply-chain worries can get a Tesla bull down, with analysts on Wall Street peeking under the hood of the electric car maker's latest results and still liking most of what they see.

title: 3 EV Stocks That Could Win the Electric Vehicle Revolution
text: The electric vehicle market remains strong with and is forecast to reach $917 billion globally in 2028. While there continues to be new entrants into the EV space all the time, a handful of manufacturers have set themselves apart as best of breed in the sector -- Lucid, Nio and Tesla.

title: Tesla's German plant hits snag as public consultation repeated
text: An online consultation for local citizens to express objections to Tesla's huge factory near Berlin will be repeated, the regional environmental ministry said on Thursday, over concerns the process did not comply with regulations.
